started:
I can forward / (copy) messages from any telegram chats (private/public channels, private/public groups, direct chats, bot) to one or many chats as soon as they arrive.
â‡ï¸ Here Are My Features â‡ï¸

forward:
**â‡ï¸ Forward Help Menu â‡ï¸**

Use it to set up automatic forwarding messages.

ðŸ›  Call /getchanel or /getgroup or /getuser before using this command to get the chat ID. 
Use the following syntax to add a channel/user/bot:
**/forward ACTION LABEL SOURCE_CHAT_ID -> TARGET_CHAT_ID**

**===============
ðŸ†˜ Important notes: ** LABEL should not contain spaces, special characters, you should make it as simple as possible
===============

**For Example**

**âž¡ï¸ One to One Chat**
/forward add work1 22222 -> 66666

**âž¡ï¸ Many to One Chat**
/forward add work1 22222, 33333 -> 66666

**âž¡ï¸ One to Many Chat**
/forward add work1 22222 -> 66666,77777

**âž¡ï¸ Many to Many Chat**
/forward add work1 22222,33333 -> 66666,77777

hasBeenConnected:
Congratulations you have successfully connected.

Now you can use our free feature using the command menu below. Welcome
forwardFromAndToNotNumber:
Please fill in **SOURCE_CHAT_ID** and **TARGET_CHAT_ID** with numbers and make sure without spaces.

**Example:**
`/forward add work1 22222 -> 66666`

firstConnection:
**âš™ Connect Help Menu âš™**

Use it to connect your account with Auto Forward Message Telegram Bot, You will need at least one connected account with Auto Forward Message Telegram Bot to use other commands

Enter the phone number of the telegram account which is already a member of the desired source chats, along with country code

**Command Arguments:**
/connect PHONE_NUMBER

**For Example:**
/connect +84444444444

You can find every country prefix code by
